description:
Visual Studio 2013 updates are cumulative releases that include new features and fixes that were delivered in previous Visual Studio 2013 Updates.

What's new in Visual Studio 2013 Update 5

  - Cloud-based load testing from Azure datacenters worldwide
  - Current iteration query token
  - Team Project Rename support for Local Workspaces

For a list of fixed bugs, known issues and workarounds, see [this page](https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/kb/3021976).
author: Microsoft
